title: Claude Code Auto-Refresh
description: Settings for Claude Code Auto-Refresh extension

enabled.title: Enable Auto-Refresh
enabled.description: Enable automatic refreshing of notebooks when modified by Claude Code

showNotifications.title: Show Notifications
showNotifications.description: Show notifications when notebooks are automatically refreshed

conflictResolution.title: Conflict Resolution
conflictResolution.description: How to handle conflicts when you have unsaved changes and external modifications occur

showWelcomeBanner.title: Show Welcome Banner
showWelcomeBanner.description: Show welcome banner with usage tips when the extension loads

refreshDelay.title: Refresh Delay (ms)
refreshDelay.description: Delay in milliseconds before refreshing after detecting file changes (helps batch rapid changes)

logLevel.title: Log Level
logLevel.description: Control console output level: none (no logs), info (important events), debug (verbose logging)
